overview: In Leather Virgin, Drew Andrews explores the leather sex world for the first time. First, Tanner Reeves and Drew visit a leather sex club where Eduardo gives Eric York a reason to walk bowlegged. Next, John Marcus gets Blade Thompson clean as a whistle. Then Sam Ritter receives a dose of Tanner Reeves and Cutter West, and finally Tanner tops Drew's evening off.
title: Leather Virgin
